org.apache.juneau

Interface PropertyConverter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The normalized form.

    public interface PropertyConverter<T>
    Used to convert property values to standardized Boolean/Integer/Class/Object values in property store builders.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PropertyConverter<Boolean> BOOLEAN_CONVERTER
      Converts objects to booleans.
      static PropertyConverter<Class<?>> CLASS_CONVERTER
      Converts objects to classes.
      static PropertyConverter<Integer> INTEGER_CONVERTER
      Converts objects to integers.
      static PropertyConverter<Object> OBJECT_CONVERTER
      Converts objects to objects.
      static PropertyConverter<String> STRING_CONVERTER
      Converts objects to strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T convert(Object o)
      Convert the value to normalized form.

    • Field Detail

        T convert(Object o)
        Convert the value to normalized form.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
